input_text:
Job Title: Mechanical Product Design Engineer

Location: Peachtree City, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Summary

Permanent Position: Immediate need for a Mechanical Product Design Engineer with experience or knowledge of HVAC/R, refrigeration technologies, or thermal dynamics. This position has high growth potential. The Mechanical Product Design Engineer will focus on the design, research, and testing of mechanical and electromechanical systems for existing and new refrigeration equipment.

Minimum Qualifications

Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field or an equivalent combination of education and industry experience Experience leading projects across multiple business functions

Preferred Qualifications

Experience with Creo and Windchill or similar CAD software Knowledge of test equipment and measurement instrumentation Familiarity with manufacturing processes Fabrication experience Team-oriented and collaborative individual with excellent communication skills

location: PEACHTREE CITY, Georgia

job type: Permanent

salary: $70,000 - 85,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 5pm

education: Bachelors

Responsibilities

Concept development, evaluation, selection, verification, implementation into production, and support in manufacturing and the field Lead projects by interacting with other departments within the company Design and modeling using 3d CAD software Performs engineering calculations to meet product specifications 

Qualifications

Experience level: ExperiencedMinimum 2 years of experienceEducation: Bachelors (required)

Skills

Product DesignMechanical EngineeringCADMechanical Design

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
